snippet.title: Battlefield Waltz Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Battlefield Waltz is a fantasy otome game developed by Otomate and published in English by Idea Factory International for Nintendo Switch.

Game Page: https://blerdyotome.com/games/battlefield-waltz
_____________________________
Meet Lan, The Maiden of the Cursed Sword, as she trains in combat alongside elite warriors and compassionate lovers. Upon facing tragedy, Lan is both blessed and cursed by a new power–the power of the Cursed Sword. She shall now forge new bonds in search of a place to belong. With up to 6 romanceable characters, can love bloom on the battlefield for Lan?
_____________________________
Follow me on Social Media! 

Website: https://blerdyotome.com
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/blerdyotome
Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/BlerdyOtome
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blerdyotome
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BlerdyOtome

 #otome #battlefieldwaltz #nintendoswitch #trailer #SenjounoWaltz
